qas.question: Where is the Museo de Guacho y de la Moneda located?
Where is the Museo Naval located?
Where is the Museo y Parque Fernando Garcia located?

context: There are also other types of museums in the city. The Museo del Gaucho y de la Moneda, located in <a0_0>the Centro<a0_0/>, has distinctive displays of the historical culture of Uruguay's gauchos, their horse gear, silver work and mate (tea), gourds, and bombillas <a1_0>(drinking straws<a1_0/>) in odd designs. The Museo Naval, is located on <a2_0>the eastern waterfront in Buceo<a2_0/> and offers exhibits depicting the maritime history of Uruguay. The Museo del Automóvil, belonging to the Automobile Club of Uruguay, has a rich collection of vintage cars which includes a 1910 Hupmobile. The Museo y Parque Fernando García in <a3_0>Carrasco<a3_0/>, a transport and automobile museum, includes old horse carriages and some early automobiles. The Castillo Pittamiglio, with an unusual façade, highlights the eccentric legacy of Humberto Pittamiglio, local alchemist and architect.
